mapper.update:
update tms_order_info
waybill_no = #{waybillNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
shipping_id = #{shippingId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
customer_order_id = #{customerOrderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
tracking_no = #{trackingNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
depot_id = #{depotId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_type = #{orderType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
rate = #{rate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
currency = #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cod_amount = #{codAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
shipping_fee = #{shippingFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
shipping_status = #{shippingStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
customer_account = #{customerAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
route_code = #{routeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
shipped_time = #{shippedTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
departure_time = #{departureTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
arrival_time = #{arrivalTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
delivered_time = #{deliveredTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gmt_created = #{gmtCreated,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
site_id = #{siteId,jdbcType=TINYINT},
customer_order_sn = #{customerOrderSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
language_site = #{languageSite,jdbcType=TINYINT},
order_amount = #{orderAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
goods_num = #{goodsNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where tms_order_id = #{tmsOrderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tms_order_info set waybill_no = #{waybillNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, customer_order_id = #{customerOrderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tracking_no = #{trackingNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, depot_id = #{depotId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_type = #{orderType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, rate = #{rate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, currency = #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cod_amount = #{codAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, shipping_fee=#{shipppingFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, shipping_status = #{shippingStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, customer_account = #{customerAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, route_code = #{routeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shipped_time = #{shippedTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, departure_time = #{departureTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, arrival_time = #{arrivalTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, delivered_time = #{deliveredTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gmt_created = #{gmtCreated,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, site_id = #{siteId,jdbcType=TINYINT}, customer_order_sn = #{customerOrderSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, language_site = #{languageSite,jdbcType=TINYINT}, order_amount = #{orderAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, goods_num = #{goodsNum, jdbcType=INTEGER} where tms_order_id = #{tmsOrderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select o.customer_order_id as customerOrderId, o.tracking_no as trackingNo, o.route_code as routeCode, o. order_type as orderType, r.region_name as destinationCountry from tms_order_info o left join tms_order_user_info u on o.tms_order_id = u.tms_order_id left join tms_region r on u.consignee_country = r.region_id where o.customer_order_id in
#{item}

select c.shipping_name as shippingName,d.telphone as telephone,e.track_link as trackLink from tms_shipping c LEFT JOIN tms_shipping_country_telphone d ON c.shipping_id = d.shipping_id LEFT JOIN tms_carrier e ON c.carrier_terminal_delivery_id = e.carrier_id WHERE c.shipping_id = #{shippingId} limit 1

select
from tms_order_info where tracking_no = #{trackingNo} limit 1
mapper.sql: from tms_order_info o left join tms_shipping s on o.route_code = s.shipping_code
